fields.review: John Bragg is a very accessible trail. The parking lot is nearby, the trail is wide and paved with only small inclines. The only major issue is the lack of bathrooms.
The Old Mill is a great place to visit! There is a bit of a steep hill and a narrow bridge, but overall this trail is great!
Shimmer falls is a challenging trail for many people regardless of ability level. The trail is rocky and the parking lot is far from the trail entrance.
